summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and authorizing issuance and sale of $4,500,000 of Limited Levy General Obligation Bonds to provide for certain improvements to the Public Safety Building; creating a construction fund and a bond interest and redemption fund; providing for the annual levy and collection of taxes, along with other available money, to pay the principal and interest on the bonds; and authorizing the City Comptroller with the advice and assistance of the Debt Management Policy Advisory Committee to arrange such temporary or interim financing for said improvements as shall be found in the best interests of the City.
